import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; function Navbar() { const [current, setCurrent] = useState(""); const focusNavigation = (value) => { return ( "block py-2 pr-4 pl-3" + (current === value ? " text-indigo-600 dark:text-indigo-400" : " text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400") ); }; return (

); } export default Navbar;
